## Useful Info

**Deep dwarf berserkers** are devout followers of [Trog](/Trog "Trog"), taking advantage of Trog's granted abilities to render themselves deadly in combat. When generated with decent weapons and armour, they can be very durable, deadly opponents. They are occasionally found in packs of other [deep dwarves](/Deep_dwarf_\(monster\) "Deep dwarf (monster)") in [the Abyss](/The_Abyss "The Abyss").

## Spells

| Spell set |                                                          |
| :-------- | -------------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1     | [Brothers in Arms](/Brothers_in_Arms "Brothers in Arms") |
| Slot2     | *none*                                                   |
| Slot3     | [Trog's Hand](/Trog%27s_Hand "Trog's Hand")              |
| Slot4     | [Berserker Rage](/Berserker_Rage "Berserker Rage")       |
| Slot5     | *none*                                                   |
| Slot6     | *none*                                                   |

## Tips & Tricks

- Once they go berserk, focus on taking them down quickly. Their damage output can be scary, especially when armed with [branded](/Brand "Brand") weapons.
- If you intend to attack with [Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes"), do so *before* they use Trog's Hand and gain doubled [magic resistance](/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance").
- When low on [HP](/HP "HP"), they'll use Brothers in Arms to suddenly add a [berserk](/Berserk "Berserk") ally to the list of monsters you need to worry about. Don't leave them wounded.

## History

Deep dwarf berserkers were removed in [0.14](/0.14 "0.14").
